name: OtherCardiacSurgery_SCT
title: Other Cardiac Surgery_SCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a cardiac surgery procedure other than a CABG.  These procedures include surgery on congenital heart defects.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a cardiac surgical procedure other than a CABG.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent a cardiac surgical procedure other than a CABG, including heart transplant.  Codes used are to be SNOMED codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes for ASD closures, PFO closures, Transmyocardial Revascularization, Resection or Plication of LV Aneurysm, AICD, pacemaker, VAD implantation, ECMO, septal or ventricular myomectomy, valves, and endoscopic approach.)
